tool_description: An API designed to help users and businesses manage their product inventory efficiently, reduce waste, and get product usage suggestions and recipes.
name: InventoryManager
title: InventoryManager

api_list.name: DIY Product Usage Suggestions
api_list.description: This endpoint provides innovative and practical DIY (Do It Yourself) usage suggestions for common household and office items. By inputting a specific product, users can receive creative ideas on how to repurpose or utilize that product in various DIY projects around their home or workspace. The suggestions are generated using advanced AI models, ensuring diverse and valuable recommendations tailored to the input product. Whether you're looking to reuse an old item or find a new purpose for something you have lying around, this endpoint can inspire a range of DIY solutions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://inventorymanager.p.rapidapi.com/diy-suggestions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inventorymanager.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description: Users can login by providing their username and password. This will return a JWT token which should be used for authentication in subsequent requests.

api_list.name: Share a Product
api_list.description: Mark a specific product as available for sharing, donation, or distribution

optional_parameters.name: product_id
optional_parameters.default: The unique identifier of the product you wish to share
